K10D0225_H0226:282a-1: a'arya tri shra ra na ga ma na n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
K10D0225_H0226:282a-3: 'phags pa gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10D0225_H0226:282a-4: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0225_H0226:282a-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10D0225_H0226:282a-6: bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed
K10D0225_H0226:282a-7: kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rla
K10D0225_H0226:282a-8: ba na / dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i
K10D0225_H0226:282a-9: dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig
K10D0225_H0226:282b-0: ba na / tu bzhugs so // @282b de nas
K10D0225_H0226:282b-1: de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ra dva ti'i
K10D0225_H0226:282b-2: bu gcig pu dben par 'dug pa dang /
K10D0225_H0226:282b-3: sems kyis sems kyi yongs su rtog pa 'di lta bu skyes so //
K10D0225_H0226:282b-5: bdag gi mngon sum du gyur na /
K10D0225_H0226:282b-6: bde bar gshegs pa chos kyi rje'i spyan sngar bdag song la rigs kyi bu'am /
K10D0225_H0226:282b-7: rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa gang la la sangs rgyas dang /
K10D0225_H0226:282b-9: dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba'i gang zag de'i bsod nams ji snyed cig /
K10D0225_H0226:282b-10: gsog par 'gyur ba'i don de zhu bar bya'o snyam du sems so //
K10D0225_H0226:282b-11: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu phye
K10D0225_H0226:282b-12: ma red kyi dus kyi tshe nang du yang dag
K10D0225_H0226:282b-13: par 'jog las langs te bcom ldan 'das ga la
K10D0225_H0226:282b-14: ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
K10D0225_H0226:282b-15: zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu
K10D0225_H0226:282b-16: 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan
K10D0225_H0226:282b-17: 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus 'di
K10D0225_H0226:282b-20: bdag gcig pu dben par mchis te /
K10D0225_H0226:282b-21: nang du yang dag 'jog la mchis pa na sems
K10D0225_H0226:282b-22: kyis sems kyi yongs su rtog pa 'di lta bu
K10D0225_H0226:282b-24: rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa gang la la sangs rgyas dang /
K10D0225_H0226:282b-26: dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchis pa'i
K10D0225_H0226:282b-27: gang zag de'i bsod nams ji snyed cig gsog par
K10D0225_H0226:282b-29: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10D0225_H0226:282b-30: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10D0225_H0226:283a-1: khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /
K10D0225_H0226:283a-2: skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /
K10D0225_H0226:283a-3: 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /
K10D0225_H0226:283a-4: skye bo'i tshogs phal po che'i don dang /
K10D0225_H0226:283a-5: lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang /
K10D0225_H0226:283a-6: bde ba'i phyir zhus pa legs so legs so //
K10D0225_H0226:283a-7: gang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'ongs te
K10D0225_H0226:283a-8: don 'di yongs su zhu bar sems pa de ni
K10D0225_H0226:283a-9: / sh'a ri'i bu; don de nyid rnam par shes par bya ba'i phyir dpes bstan par bya ste /
K10D0225_H0226:283a-10: skyes bu gang zag 'ga' zhig rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu
K10D0225_H0226:283a-11: 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur pas gang 'di
K10D0225_H0226:283a-12: dzambu'i gling dang / nye ba'i gling zheng dang srid
K10D0225_H0226:283a-13: du dpag tshad bdun stong yod pa'i dzambu'i gling de
K10D0225_H0226:283a-14: na gang srog chags gnas pa de dag 'jig rten
K10D0225_H0226:283a-15: gyi khams gzhan du bkod de /
K10D0225_H0226:283a-16: lag mthil ltar mnyam par byas pa rin po che sna bdun la 'di lta ste /
K10D0225_H0226:283a-23: spug rnams la dzambu'i gling cam gyi mchod rten srid
K10D0225_H0226:283a-24: du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar la thug par
K10D0225_H0226:283a-25: brtsigs te / mchod rten de la lha'i spos dang /
K10D0225_H0226:283a-28: lha'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang /
K10D0225_H0226:283a-29: ba dan rnams kyis mchod pa byas la /
K10D0225_H0226:283a-30: de nas skyes bu de rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu 'di
K10D0225_H0226:283a-31: lta bu dang ldan par gyur pas gang rgya mtsho
K10D0225_H0226:283b-0: chen po bzhi'i chu de dag 'jig rten @283b gyi
K10D0225_H0226:283b-2: ma ru ka'i til mar gyis rgya mtsho chen po
K10D0225_H0226:283b-3: bzhi ltar bkang ba'i nang du snying po ri rab
K10D0225_H0226:283b-4: tsam btsugs la / bskal pa mang po'i mtha'i ji
K10D0225_H0226:283b-5: srid par mar me'i rgyun mi 'chad par bus na
K10D0225_H0226:283b-6: tsam btsugs la / / sh'a ri'i bu /
K10D0225_H0226:283b-8: skyes bu de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du gsog snyam mam /
K10D0225_H0226:283b-15: rang sangs rgyas thams cad las 'das pa lags te /
K10D0225_H0226:283b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul lo //
K10D0225_H0226:283b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul lo //
K10D0225_H0226:283b-25: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig sangs rgyas dang /
K10D0225_H0226:283b-27: dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba'i bsod nams kyi
K10D0225_H0226:283b-28: phung po de la bsod nams kyi phung po snga
K10D0225_H0226:283b-29: ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste
K10D0225_H0226:283b-34: bgrang bar yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
K10D0225_H0226:283b-35: de nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe
K10D0225_H0226:283b-36: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
K10D0225_H0226:283b-44: kun tu rab tu ldeg go /
K10D0225_H0226:283b-45: de'i tshe der klog gi rgyun chen po byung ngo //
K10D0225_H0226:284a-0: lha rnams kyis kyang rnga sgra bsgrags @284a *//
K10D0225_H0226:284a-1: so; ;de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0225_H0226:284a-3: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
K10D0225_H0226:284a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0225_H0226:284a-7: khyod kyis 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sgo
K10D0225_H0226:284a-8: mtha' yas pa sgrub pa zhes bya bar zungs shig
K10D0225_H0226:284a-10: de ltar blta bar bya ste /
K10D0225_H0226:284a-11: de de bzhin du zungs shig /
K10D0225_H0226:284a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K10D0225_H0226:284a-13: dge slong gzhan dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par bstod do //
